txt.en: As a Rune-keeper, you've acquired great insight into various runes that can restore the morale of your companions. The Path of the Restoring Rune will allow you to gain additional understanding of these runes and how to use them in such a way that you provide even greater morale to those who need it.
Complete the quest 'A Rune of Restoration'
The Path of the Restoring Rune

You have begun to follow the Path of the Restoring Rune. If you follow this path to its end, you will gain greater insight into various runes, allowing you to be more of a strengthening aid to your companions in difficult fights.
Completed the quest 'A Rune of Restoration'
Begin to follow the Path of the Restoring Rune
There are many challenges on along the Path of the Restoring Rune. Taking the first step may be the most difficult....
